pages.text: $(thing)Media/$ is a form of mental energy external to a mind. All living creatures generate media in trace amounts when thinking about anything, and after their thought is over it is released into the environment.$(br2)The art of casting $(thing)Hexes/$ is all about manipulating media to do your bidding.

Media can attract and repel itself, and the strength and mode of influence can be manipulated by drawing media out into patterns. Scholars of the art used a concentrated blob of media on the end of a stick: by waving it in the air in precise configurations, they are able to manipulate enough media with enough ease to influence the world itself, in the form of a Hex.

Sadly, even a fully sentient being (like me, presumably) generates so little media by themself it would be quite impractical to try and use my own brainpower to cast Hexes.$(br2)But, legend has it there are places deep under the earth where media slowly accumulates, and grows into a crystalline form...
